name: Phantom Nation
uniques: Gain [50] Gold when killing enemy units
startIntroPart1: Welcome, Trickster, leader of the Phantom Thieves! You stand as the beacon of rebellion, challenging the corrupted powers that dominate the hearts of many. From the back alleys of Shibuya to the grand palaces of the Metaverse, your mission is clear: to bring justice and reform.
startIntroPart2: Will you rise as a hero of the oppressed and lead your nation to victory? Or will the shadows consume your ambitions? The stage is yours to steal the hearts of the world!
declaringWar: Fools like you will never escape the consequences of your corruption.
attacked: The Phantom Thieves will not fall so easily!
defeated: Even if we fall, our cause lives on in the hearts of many...
introduction: Ah, a new face. We are the Phantom Thieves. Are you an ally of justice, or an agent of the system?
hateHello: Your tyranny will be your downfall.
tradeRequest: A fair deal? Thatâ€™s what a true ally of justice would propose.
